bibl.author: Ierusalimskaja, A. A
bibl.title: K voprosu o Svjazjax Sogda s Vizantiej i Egiptom (ob odnoj unikal'nojtkani iz severokavkazskogo mogil'nika Moščevaja Balka) (On the question of connections between Sogdiana, Byzantium and Egypt [concerning a unique fabric from the northern Caucasian sepulchre of Moščevaja Balka])
